text: Hagi tamagra tamagesama antahi'zana hosi afumo'za havege'ma hu'nefina, amane zamagare'za vugahazafi? Hifi havefina amane bulimakao afura avreta mopa ome rehankorigahazafi? Hianagi tamagra neginagi huta fatgoma huno refako hu'zana eri rukrahe hazageno, avuataga zankna nehigeta, fatgo avu'ava zamofo haga'a eri rukrahe hazageno, aka zankna nehie.
